Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.authentication.LoginManager

  • public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for handling Login operations with Authentication Providers and Microsoft Azure Mobile Services
